channel.title: [317][Delta] Npc Drop Error [Delta][317]
channel.description:
I go into my npc drops and add this code for the npcs i have added. [code] //General Gaardor npcdrop = 1115 667 1 5 npcdrop = 1115 35 1 5 npcdrop = 1115 746 1 5 npcdrop = 1115 2402 1 5 npcdrop = 1115 1077 1 10 npcdrop = 1115 1107 1 10 npcdrop = 1115 9991 1 2 npcdrop = 8774 1 2 //giant mole npcdrop = 3340 667 1 1 npcdrop = 3340 35 1 1 npcdrop = 3340 746 1 1 npcdrop = 3340 2402 1 1 npcdrop = 3340 1077 1 5 npcdrop = 3340 1107 1 5 npcdrop = 3340 8770 1 5 npcdrop = 3340 8002 1 1 npcdrop = 3340 8100 1 1 npcdrop = 3340 8043 1 1 npcdrop = 3340 8776 1 2 npcdrop = 3340 8775 1 2 npcdrop = 3340 8774 1 2 //mithril dragon npcdrop = 72 667 1 2 npcdrop = 72 35 1 2 npcdrop = 72 746 1 2 npcdrop = 72 2402 1 2 npcdrop = 72 1077 1 6 npcdrop = 72 1107 1 6 npcdrop = 72 8770 1 6 npcdrop = 72 8002 1 2 npcdrop = 72 8100 1 2 npcdrop = 72 8043 1 2 npcdrop = 72 8776 1 3 npcdrop = 72 8775 1 3 npcdrop = 72 8774 1 3 //chaos elemental npcdrop = 3200 667 1 4 npcdrop = 3200 35 1 4 npcdrop = 3200 746 1 4 npcdrop = 3200 2402 1 4 npcdrop = 3200 1077 1 9 npcdrop = 3200 1107 1 9 npcdrop = 3200 9991 1 1 npcdrop = 3200 9990 1 1 npcdrop = 3200 9986 1 1 npcdrop = 3200 8770 1 4 npcdrop = 3200 8002 1 2 npcdrop = 3200 8100 1 2 npcdrop = 3200 8043 1 2 npcdrop = 3200 8776 1 1 npcdrop = 3200 8775 1 1 npcdrop = 3200 8774 1 1 //corpral beast npcdrop = 2697 667 1 5 npcdrop = 2697 35 1 5 npcdrop = 2697 746 1 5 npcdrop = 2697 2402 1 5 npcdrop = 2697 1077 1 10 npcdrop = 2697 1107 1 10 npcdrop = 2697 9991 1 2 npcdrop = 2697 9990 1 2 npcdrop = 2697 9986 1 2 npcdrop = 2697 8770 1 5 npcdrop = 2697 8002 1 1 npcdrop = 2697 8100 1 1 npcdrop = 2697 8043 1 1 npcdrop = 2697 8776 1 2 npcdrop = 2697 8775 1 2 npcdrop = 2697 8774 1 2 //spirit beast npcdrop = 5 667 1 2 npcdrop = 5 35 1 2 npcdrop = 5 746 1 2 npcdrop = 5 2402 1 2 npcdrop = 5 1077 1 7 npcdrop = 5 1107 1 7 npcdrop = 5 9991 1 5 npcdrop = 5 9990 1 5 npcdrop = 5 9986 1 5 npcdrop = 5 8770 1 2 npcdrop = 5 8002 1 4 npcdrop = 5 8100 1 4 npcdrop = 5 8043 1 4 npcdrop = 5 8776 1 5 npcdrop = 5 8775 1 5 npcdrop = 5 8774 1 5 [/code] But after i add it i compile it there is no error but when i run the server it comes up with this.
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2055) at NPCHandler.(init)(NPCHandler.java:552) at server.mail(server.java:112)[/code]
What is up with it? This is the layout of the drops i add. [code] npcdrop(space)=(space)(npc number)(tab)(item number)(tab)(amount)(tab)(chance of drop)(tab)[/code]
That is the exact same as all the other code but what is wrong with it?

item.title: [317][Delta] Npc Drop Error [Delta][317]
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Open NPCHandler class and locate this line:

public double[][] drops = new double[3851][45];

You will need to change the 45 to a higher number.

x / 3 = # of drops per npc.
if x equals 45 than # of drops equals 15.

So basically, you have more than 15 drops for a particular NPC.

Read full topic
